description: This file defines the MockEndpoint class, which models a network endpoint with various properties and methods to manage clusters associated with it, mainly used for testing or simulation purposes in the Zith device framework.

classes.name: MockEndpoint
classes.description: Represents a mock device endpoint with associated clusters and properties for testing or simulation within the Zith framework.

methods.name: MockEndpoint
methods.description: Constructor initializing a MockEndpoint with basic identification and optional manufacturing details.

methods.name: addCluster
methods.description: Adds a cluster (server or client) to the endpoint.

methods.name: getServerCluster
methods.description: Retrieves a server cluster by its cluster ID.

methods.name: getClientCluster
methods.description: Retrieves a client cluster by its cluster ID.

methods.name: getServerClusterIds
methods.description: Returns the sorted list of server cluster IDs.

methods.name: getClientClusterIds
methods.description: Returns the sorted list of client cluster IDs.

methods.name: isEnabled
methods.description: Checks whether the endpoint is enabled.
